name: 杰里米·范多恩
name_full: 杰里米·范多恩 Jeremy Vandoorne
introduction: Jeremy was born an only child in Kortrijk, Belgium on February 6, 1986. As a child he wanted to become sportsman, actor or presenter.Aged twelve, he played his first role in a children's musical called "The ship of dreams". He immediately played the lead role.After his secondary school, he studied journalism. At that time he was model and became Mister Personality Belgium 2010. He also had many years of experience on stage as a presenter and animatorAfter his college years, he auditioned for the lead role in the action series for children "ROX" at Studio 100. Since 2011 he plays action hero "Xavier". The series is broadcast in Belgium, the Netherlands and dozens of other countries. Studio 100 is one of the largest companies in Europe in the field of children's productions and also has five theme parks.Jeremy performed on stage in Belgium's "Sportpaleis" and Rotterdam's "Ahoy". He also plays guest roles in other Flemish series, commercials and is still presenter.
